oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Human faeces as a resource in agriculture
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Malkki, Sirkka
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Composting and manuring
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Human excreta are a valuable source of nutrients. Their use should be promoted in order to replace some of artificial fertilisers used in agriculture. For the time being, there are many unanswered questions which need to be researched before human excreta can be widely used in plant production.
